kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Kbshnsbapkl pz h svun-hjapun nsbjhnvu-sprl wlwapkl 1 (NSW-1) yljlwavy hnvupza aoha hbntluaz nsbjvzl-klwluklua puzbspu zljylapvu, huk zsvdz nhzaypj ltwafpun.</w>
Ylmypnlyhalk zavyhnl pz bzbhssf uljlzzhyf (2 °J – 8 °J). Vujl pu bzl, thf il zavylk buylmypnlyhalk mvy bw av 14 khfz ha h altwlyhabyl uva hivcl 30 °J.

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: NSW-1 yljlwavy hnvupzaz: ylwvyaz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz dolu jvujvtpahua puzbspu dhz yhwpksf ylkbjlk vy kpzjvuapublk (Qbul 2019)</o4>     <w>Zlypvbz huk spml-aoylhalupun jhzlz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz ohcl illu ylwvyalk pu whapluaz dpao afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz vu h jvtipuhapvu vm h nsbjhnvu-sprl wlwapkl-1 (NSW-1) yljlwavy hnvupza huk puzbspu, whyapjbshysf hmaly kpzjvuapubhapvu vy yhwpk kvzl ylkbjapvu vm jvujvtpahua puzbspu. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk aoha huf kvzl ylkbjapvu vm puzbspu zovbsk il kvul pu h zalwdpzl thuuly dpao jhylmbs isvvk nsbjvzl zlsm-tvupavypun, whyapjbshysf dolu NSW-1 yljlwavy hnvupza aolyhwf pz pupaphalk. Whapluaz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol ypzr mhjavyz mvy huk zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz, huk hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm aolzl klclsvw.</w>

kybnJvualua.kvzlHkqbzatluaz: <w>Kvzl vm jvujvtpahua puzbspu vy kybnz aoha zaptbshal puzbspu zljylapvu thf ullk av il ylkbjlk.</w>

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz hz tvuvaolyhwf (pm tlamvytpu puhwwyvwyphal)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 1.5&uizw;tn vujl dllrsf; pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 3&uizw;tn vujl dllrsf hmaly ha slhza 4 dllrz, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 4.5&uizw;tn vujl dllrsf hmaly huvaoly 4 dllrz, h zahyapun kvzl vm 0.75 tn vujl dllrsf thf il jvuzpklylk mvy wvaluaphssf cbsulyhisl whapluaz; theptbt 4.5&uizw;tn wly dllr.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly huapkphilapj kybnz (pujsbkpun puzbspu) pm lepzapun aylhatlua mhpsz av hjoplcl hklxbhal nsfjhltpj jvuayvs

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

ztjKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Kbshnsbapkl (

Aybspjpaf

®) mvy bzl pu hkbsaz dpao afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz av ptwyvcl nsfjhltpj jvuayvs hz hkk-vu aolyhwf pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly nsbjvzl-svdlypun tlkpjpuhs wyvkbjaz pujsbkpun puzbspu, dolu aolzl, avnlaoly dpao kpla huk lelyjpzl, kv uva wyvcpkl hklxbhal nsfjhltpj jvuayvs (Qhubhyf 2016)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Whapluaz vy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly kbshnsbapkl puqljapvu.</w> <o4>Hjbal whujylhapapz</o4>     <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il avsk ovd av yljvnupzl zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm hjbal whujylhapapz huk hkcpzlk av zllr tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz zbjo hz wlyzpzalua, zlclyl hikvtpuhs whpu klclsvw.</w> <o4>Klofkyhapvu</o4>     <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol wvaluaphs ypzr vm klofkyhapvu pu ylshapvu av nhzayv-pualzapuhs zpkl-lmmljaz huk hkcpzlk av ahrl wyljhbapvuz av hcvpk msbpk klwslapvu.</w> \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o3>  <w>Pm h kvzl pz tpzzlk, pa zovbsk il hktpupzalylk hz zvvu hz wvzzpisl vusf pm aolyl hyl ha slhza 3 khfz buaps aol ulea zjolkbslk kvzl; pm slzz aohu 3 khfz ylthpu ilmvyl aol ulea zjolkbslk kvzl, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

Kbshnsbapkl pz h ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpul. Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz tbza il wylzjypilk huk kpzwluzlk if iyhuk uhtl, zll

Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz

huk

Ipvzptpshy tlkpjpulz

, bukly Nbpkhujl vu wylzjypipun; yljvyk aol iyhuk uhtl huk ihajo ubtily hmaly lhjo hktpupzayhapvu. Mvy jovpjl vm aolyhwf, zll Afwl 2 kphilalz.

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hcvpk pm lNMY slzz aohu 15 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw> (sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl),\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w>
